channel.title: Help me with 2 things!
channel.description:
Hi...i have a server up and running but i almost always get "Error Connecting" or something in my client...how do i fix this???
and another thing...i need to get a auto restarter for my server...coz sometimes the monsters stop dropping stuff...and i gotten many complainments about that...
i think i need to fix something in my antilag but cant figure out how the timer works...
i could get one of those auto restarters...but my main problem is problem No 1#

item.title: Help me with 2 things!
item.dc:creator: @kiamyhelp kiamyhelp
item.description:
@kiamyhelp wrote:

it might have something to do with your firewall.

it could be closing connections. and i have a voule auto restarter it you want.

u can try shutting off your firewall to see if the connection problem is fixed.

Read full topic
